ctx: intros a b Q Hreduce Hcanon Hcomb.
induction Hreduce as [| p q] using reduce_ind.

ctx: intros a b Q Hreduce Hcanon Hcomb.
induction Hreduce as [| p q] using reduce_ind.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) p, q : Term A n p0, q0 : list (Term A n) Hreduce : reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p0 q0 H : eqTerm eqA (n:=n) p q Hcanon : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) p p0) Hcomb : CombLinear Q (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) p p0) IHHreduce : canonical A0 eqA ltM p0 -> CombLinear Q p0 -> CombLinear Q q0 Unable to unify "CombLinear Q q0" with "CombLinear Q (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) q q0)".

original: intros a b Q Hreduce Hcanon Hcomb. induction Hreduce as [| p q] using reduce_ind. - auto. - apply CombLinear_1 with (a := a) (p := q) (q := q) (s := b). + auto. + auto. + apply IHHreduce. * auto.
